an9.30:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these nine methods to get rid of resentment.
an9.30:1.3: Thinking: ‘They harmed me, but what can I possibly do?’ you get rid of resentment.
an9.30:1.11: Thinking: ‘They will help someone I dislike, but what can I possibly do?’ you get rid of resentment.
an9.30:1.12: These are the nine methods to get rid of resentment.”
